Name: TouHou Music Recording
About the game: This is a TouHou doujin music recording game. Player plays the roles int gensokyo, traveling across gensokyo, while recording various songs at the same time. In 'Free Mode', player can choose the songs he like. When the song is playing, yellow notes will come out with the rolling disk. Player can press certain keys to record the music. The more accurately one presses, the higher the score will be. If one makes a wrong press, the score will drop. Player can enter 'Tutorial' to learn more detailed operations. 'Travel Mode' is used for unlocking certain songs, reading the story and playing with different disks. 'My Album' is used for constructing one's own songs, notes and skins. Enjoy the fun of recording music !
